html_privacy:
Privacy Policy - LookMyCruise

1. Information We Collect

We collect various types of information to provide you with the best possible experience:

  • Personal Information: When you book a cruise, sign up for our newsletter, orcontact us, we may collect details such as your name, phone number, email, mailing address, andpayment information.
  • Technical Information: Non-personal data such as IP address, browser type,and operating system may be collected to enhance website performance.
  • Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your experience, track activity, andanalyze trends. You can disable cookies through your browser settings.

2. How We Use Your Information

We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:

  • Providing Services: To process cruise bookings, handle customer support, anddeliver requested services.
  • Improving the Website: To personalize your experience and analyze userinteractions.
  • Marketing: To send promotional emails about new cruises, offers, orservices. You can opt out anytime.
  • Legal Compliance: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights.

3. How We Share Your Information

We do not sell or rent your details but may share your data under the following circumstances:

  • Cruise Line Partners: Your booking information may be shared with cruiselines for reservation processing.
  • Service Providers: We may share data with third-party providers who assistwith payment processing or communications.
  • Legal and Safety Reasons: Information may be disclosed to comply with legalprocesses or protect users.

4. Data Security

We implement administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personalinformation. However, no transmission over the Internet is completely secure.

5. Your Rights and Choices

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
  • Correction: Request corrections for inaccuracies in your personal data.
  • Deletion: Request that we delete your personal details, subject to legalobligations.
  • Opt-Out: Unsubscribe from promotional emails at any time.

6. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These websites have their own privacypolicies, and we are not responsible for their practices.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please review it periodically for any changes

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions, please contact us at:

LookMyCruise
Email: XXX
Phone: XXXX
